title: Seeing catfish in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The dream of seeing catfish in a dream has been interpreted by many translators, including Ibn Sirin, and today we look at the interpretation of the dream of seeing catfish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing catfish in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained many interpretations of the dream of catfish and we take in Consider the following: When you see catfish in a dream and see it caught from clear fresh water. This dream is a sign of the abundant sustenance that this person will receive. And that this person will be able to make many changes in his life and these changes will be for the better. However, the person sees In a dream, he catches a catfish with a hook. This is evidence of goodness, great living, and money that awaits the dreamer. Also, when you see a catfish in a dream, it is unclean. This dream is an indication that the owner of this dream will happen to him in his life. Or that he will earn his livelihood in a way. Not permissible. They also saw catfish in a dream and they were dead and smelled bad. This vision shows the many problems that the dreamer faces in his life. It also indicates the financial hardship that the dreamer is suffering from in his dream. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of a dream about fishing with a rod. Interpretation of a dream about catfish for a married woman in A married woman may see a dream about a catfish in her dream, and this dream has some different connotations and interpretations, such as: Also, seeing a married woman in her sleep dreaming about a catfish and catching it while it is alive. This dream is evidence that this woman will be able to raise her children and reach The stage of getting her daughters married. Especially when a married woman saw in a dream that she was fishing for catfish and she was small in size. This is an indication of the suffering that she will see in her life and the anxiety that controls her. In addition, seeing a married woman in a dream is a clean catfish that lives in the water Fresh. This is evidence of the abundance and goodness that this woman will see in her life and in her children. This dream also indicates that her husband will obtain a prestigious job and an excellent position in his work. Such as a married woman seeing in a dream that she is eating catfish meat. This is a sign of the great inheritance that It will come into her life and she will enjoy it for a long time. Interpretation of a dream about catfish for a pregnant woman in a dreamThe dream of seeing catfish in a pregnant woman’s dream can also occur, which has many different interpretations and associations, and we can mention the following: Also, a pregnant woman may see catfish during She fell asleep while being chased or someone next to her was chasing her. This dream is an indication of the huge amounts of money that this pregnant woman will obtain, and the method is no different. Especially since the pregnant woman can see the catfish in her dream and that was clear. This dream has a great indication of the ease of her pregnancy and that she will not You feel pregnancy problems or birth pains. Likewise, when you see a pregnant woman in a dream, she catches a catfish and can catch it. It is an indication of the strength of this woman and her strong ability to withstand the difficulties and problems that may arise in her life. When

title: Interpretation of seeing an orchard and garden in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing an orchard and a garden inside a dream is considered one of the happy and beautiful interpretations, as the dreamer seeing an orchard and a garden during his sleep feels happy and well-intentioned, so the dreamer asks many interpreters to ask about this vision to make sure it is a good vision or not, and in this article we will tell everything about this vision. You may also be interested in the following: Bathing in a dream Interpretation of seeing an orchard and a garden in a dream Interpretation of seeing an orchard and a garden in a dream Some commentators consider this interpretation of seeing an orchard and a garden in a dream to be a good vision that indicates goodness. This indicates that this dreamer lives in psychological calm and reassurance, and that he is satisfied with what God gave it to him, and he endured a lot of trouble, and praise be to God in these hardships. But if he sees himself dusting and taking out fallen leaves from trees, this indicates that he disbelieved in some worldly matters, and quickly returned to his senses. If the dreamer sees that he is cleaning the garden floor from insects This means that the dreamer must refrain from committing anything that would displease God, and that he wants to return to God in sincere repentance. You may be interested in: Pregnancy in a dream The interpretation of seeing an orchard and garden in a dream for a married woman Some commentators consider this Interpretation of seeing an orchard and garden in a dream in the stage of psychological calm for a woman Or facing marital problems. If you find a married woman sitting in the garden, this indicates that her married life is fine and that she loves her husband very much and lives with him in peace. If she is sitting in a garden with a lot of thorns and plants on the ground, this indicates that she is living a life Gloomy with her husband, full of quarrels and lack of peace in her married life. If a married woman sees that her husband takes her with him to a beautiful garden to enjoy together, this indicates that her husband is very happy with her in her married life. You may also be interested in: Penguin in a dream Interpretation of seeing the orchard and garden In a dream for a man, many commentators explain that a man’s vision of gardens and orchards is one of his praiseworthy dreams, and that God will grant him goodness in the near future. If a man finds himself in a beautiful orchard that smells of perfume with a beautiful scent, this means that this man will be honored by God by following a diet Broad and a blessing in his professional life. If a man sees a girl sitting in the garden, this means that this dreamer will get married soon. Interpretation of seeing the orchard and garden in a dream for a pregnant woman: This dream shows the pregnant woman that her fetus is fine and her health is intact from any harm or illness. If a pregnant woman sees herself In a garden with a beautiful view, this indicates that the woman is in good health and that she is experiencing psychological stability during the months of her pregnancy. If a pregnant woman sees a beautiful garden at the end of her pregnancy, this means that her fetus will be born easily and safely. You may also be interested in: Washing the dead. Interpretation of a vision The orchard and garden in a dream for one girl indicates that the interpretation of seeing the orchard and garden in a dream indicates that the girl will get her share of marriage or work, or

title: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, letter K

preview.html: The respected researcher has provided many interpretations about the letter Kaf, which is one of the letters of the Arabic alphabet, and this letter can be linked to more symbols and objects that many of us may have in our dreams, such as the cup and the book. , author, ball, planet, ram, heel, sulfur, shroud, shoulder, Kaaba and more. Interpretation of seeing a chair by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees himself sitting on a chair in his dream. This may mean that he assumes a position, because it indicates his high status Ibn Sirin indicates in his interpretation that if he sees himself possessing a chair and sitting on it, perhaps it is news of marriage, because it indicates the birth of a child, God willing. When you see a broken chair in a dream, it may be an unpleasant vision. It indicates the loss of position and money, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an uncle in a dream by Ibn Sirin: When a person sees his uncle in a dream, it may mean that the fortuneteller is lying. It also indicates the acquisition of forbidden money, then the dreamer hastens to repent and seek forgiveness. If someone sees that he is lighting matches to cook in the pot or lighting a light bulb. This could It means the end of anxiety and the alleviation of the situation, God willing. We chose for you: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, a letter with an interpretation of seeing a cave according to Ibn Sirin. If someone sees in his dream that he is inside a cave. This may indicate the collapse of fears in his life. Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees a cave in his dream. This could mean increasing his livelihood with a lot of money and an abundance of goodness in his life. If one sees a cave in his dream, it may mean that God will cover the dreamer in all aspects of his life. Ibn Sirin suggests that seeing a cave in a dream may indicate the end of worries. In the event that If the dreamer is sick, there is evidence of recovery soon, God willing. When a person sees a cave in a dream, this may indicate the dreamer’s long life. Interpretation of seeing a ram by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin indicates that if you dream of slaughtering a ram and distributing its meat, it may contain evidence of distributing an inheritance. The man is near the dreamer, and God knows best. When a person sees in a dream slaughtering a ram, but does not eat its meat. This may be a sign of the dreamer’s victory over a strong enemy of his in reality. When a person dreams of slaughtering a ram and eating its meat. This may indicate that the dreamer’s condition is worsening, and if He was sick, so it is good news of recovery, because it indicates comfort after hardship. Interpretation of seeing kohl by Ibn Sirin. Whoever sees in a dream that he is taking kohl in his hand. In this good news is that the priest will receive more money. If you see kohl in a dream, it is a sign of kindness, sustenance, insight, and faith. To the monarch. When an unmarried or widow sees kohl in her dream, it can be a sign of her closeness to marriage. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream book Ibn Sirin says that if one sees a book in a dream, it can be a sign of power. If someone sees in a dream That he writes in a newspaper, this indicates that he will inherit an inheritance soon. If one sees a book in a dream, perhaps it indicates strength, according to the Almighty’s saying: “O Yahya, take the book with strength.” If one sees that he takes a book from the Imam in his dream, then

title: Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream or a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Tiles are a square structure that is placed on floors, walls, ceilings, and work surfaces to add an elegant and beautiful appearance. There are different types such as porcelain, metal, glass, polished stone and seeing tiles in a dream. There are many clues that we will mention in this article and will explain the most important interpretations given by great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream: seeing the ground furnished with new tiles In a dream, it is a sign of a new and happy beginning in the dreamer’s life. Seeing broken tiles in a dream is about the troubles and problems that the dreamer is going through in his life. Seeing tiles in a dream is a sign of hearing happy news and good luck for the fortuneteller. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing bathroom tiles being removed in a dream. Interpretation of seeing tiles in A dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says that seeing the tiles is present in the place of marble in a dream, an indication of facilitating circumstances and achieving what is desired. As evidenced by seeing new tiles, a new life, whether it is a marriage, a new job, or a project. Seeing tiles in a place that is inappropriate for others, such as the bathroom, for example A sign of agreement and understanding. Seeing tiles in a dream indicates good living conditions. Seeing tiles in their natural parts so that the dreamer can buy new clothes. Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream for a single woman. Seeing tiles in a person’s dream indicates that she enjoys the qualities of love and understanding between her and those around her, whether they are relatives or Friends. Seeing white tiles in a girl’s dream is one of the good visions that foretell goodness and good news. Seeing dirty tiles in a girl’s dream is for the worry and anxiety that she feels at this time. If a girl sees that she is cleaning tiles in a dream, it is a sign that she is working hard on herself to achieve the best for herself in The future. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing marble in a dream. Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream for a married woman. Seeing new tiles in a married woman’s dream indicates happiness and goodness in her home and diet. Seeing broken tiles in a married woman’s dream indicates that she is wasting money in vain, as well as her time on things that are not useful to her. She and her family. If a married woman sees that she is changing the tiles in her house, it is a sign of a new stage in her life and a change for the better. A married woman seeing her tiles stained indicates problems and disagreements between her and her husband or children. If a married woman sees that she was cleaning the tiles in a dream, it is a sign of Her story and her desire to resolve the differences between her and her husband. Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing new tiles in a dream indicates the presence of a pregnant woman. Her pregnancy is easy and the birth is easy and she and her fetus will be fine, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing tiles in a dream for a man. Seeing a man removing tiles in a dream indicates his desire to change His living conditions. Seeing in a dream a man spraying water to clean tiles indicates his repentance for sins

title: Interpretation of an old man in a dream - Seeing an old woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the old dream The old dream The old man in a dream, interpretation of dreams, meaning of a dream by Ibn Sirin The old woman in a dream The old man in a dream It is in a dream about impotence, and perhaps it indicates the demise of the world, and perhaps it indicates the afterlife because it is against this world, and it indicates wine because it is one of its names, and it It indicates the cow because it is one of its names. And his names. Perhaps an old woman in a dream indicates pregnancy after despair. Perhaps seeing an old woman means cunning, deception, provocation and slander. The sick old woman is helpless, and the thirsty old woman is dry. The old woman points to a swampy land that does not grow. Whoever sees an ugly-looking old woman announces rebellion and war. The unfaithful old woman is deprived of money, and the armed elderly woman gives money willingly to whoever sees her. Everyone who grows up will be respected. The unknown old woman indicates the barren year. The ugly old woman may be a harbinger of the end of war and drought. The year of ancient Anumbria, emaciated, this year came of age. An old woman with a sad face is worldly with anxiety and every state, and if she is naked, it is a scandal in his earthly life. Whoever sees an old woman entering his house, his world will come to him, and if he sees her leaving him, his world will leave. And if a woman sees that she is old, then she is the fairness of her world. Interpretation of seeing an old woman in one dream. An old man in an unmarried woman’s dream is a good omen if she is not a stranger or unknown and it is interpreted according to her characteristics and name. If her appearance is beautiful, this expresses the good that the dreamer can experience in this the world . The name of the old man in a dream of an unmarried man can help interpret the dream. For example, if the old woman's name is correct, it expresses Salah. In religion and in this world, if the name of the old woman in the dream is Aisha, then the old woman represents a satisfied life and a happy life. It is good in interpretation to see an unmarried woman or an old woman in good health, because the old woman in this case shows the world, then she expresses Safety in every matter, and the unmarried woman’s grandmother in her dream expresses someone she talked to and it is likely that what he said in the dream will come true or come true in waking life. As for an old, bald, or ugly old woman, it is bad in interpretation, and her appearance in a dream expresses Problems and diseases of the world. Interpretation of seeing an old woman in a married dream: As we indicated from the beginning of the article, an old woman in a dream is good news in general if she is beautiful or smiling and there is no element in her dress that indicates unhappiness. A young woman. If the old woman who appears in a married woman’s dream is beautiful, with a good smell, sweet features, and clean in her dress, then her words in the vision are good news. As for a sick or elderly woman, it means incapacity or poverty in the interpretation, and perhaps the old woman A sick woman in interpretation indicates a world full of problems and troubles. An ugly old woman in a married woman’s dream indicates hatred and strife. If he sees her coming towards her, the person will fear

title: Interpretation of a dream about darkness and fear of darkness in a dream

preview.html: Seeing darkness in a dream symbolizes corruption and injustice, and darkness in general is not good. Interpretation of seeing darkness in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin explained seeing darkness in a dream by abstaining from obedience and misguidance. Whoever sees the darkness of the night in a dream, this means that he is covering from people what he wants to cover, and to see Darkness during the day in a dream shows serious injustice, and seeing total darkness in a dream shows worries, anxiety and sadness. A dream of darkness generally indicates confusion in the matter and the inability to make appropriate decisions. Al-Nabulsi says that entering a place of darkness in a dream indicates the injustice and arbitrariness of the dreamer. And whoever sees that he came out of a dark place in a dream, he will repent if he was sinful, or release him if he was imprisoned, or Heal if sick, and if you see that you are illuminating a dark place. In a dream, this indicates the light of the heart and insight. The darkness of the sea in a dream is evidence of the oppression of the Sultan, and if you see the sky darkening in the dream, this indicates the spread of diseases and the rise in prices. Whoever dreams of holding a wedding party in the dark, this means that he will fall into misfortunes, and seeing the opening of A funeral in the dark in a dream indicates a lack of religion, and if you see yourself praying in the dark in a dream, it indicates an unacceptable act. Gustav Miller says: “Seeing darkness in a dream means illness and exhaustion.” Whoever sees that he has lost a child or a friend in the dark in a dream This indicates the outbreak of revolutions, and seeing darkness in a dream indicates problems in relationships with others and at work, and God knows best. Interpretation of walking in the dark in a dream: A dream about walking in the dark indicates corruption of efforts and then deception. Whoever sees that he is walking in the darkness until he reaches the light in the dream, this indicates Comfort is near, and if you see that you are walking on a long, dark road, this indicates the difficulty of achieving goals and desires, and to see yourself running in the dark in a dream, this indicates danger and risk in business and concerns. If you see yourself falling while walking in the dark in a dream, this indicates On your bad circumstances as a result of your corrupt actions, and seeing yourself walking and getting lost in the dark in a dream indicates the bad behavior of the dreamer. Walking with a dead man in the dark in a dream means that you are following his corrupt approach. Interpretation of seeing yourself walking in a dream. Meaning of sitting in the dark in a dream: Sitting in the dark in a dream is a sign of indulging in falsehood and evil deeds. Whoever sees that he is sitting alone in the dark in a dream, this indicates fear and isolation. Seeing that he is sitting with another person in the dark in a dream indicates that you are following his bad behavior and dreaming of sitting with him. People in the dark indicate coexistence with people of corruption and oppression. Sitting with a girl in the dark in a dream means indulging in temptation and committing great sins, and whoever sees that he is sitting with children in the dark in a dream, this indicates anxiety and distress. To see in a dream that you are sitting With relatives in the dark means the outbreak of problems and disputes between them, and if you see that you are sitting with your friends in the dark, it means living with bad people. A dream indicates

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying a gift for someone and what does it indicate?

preview.html: A dream about buying a gift for a man. A gift is something that the soul seeks and loves, and it works to form hearts and increase love. Seeing a gift in a dream, whether it is gold, a watch, clothes, or flowers, is because it is beautiful and expresses good news. Relationships, love and friendship Seeing yourself sending gifts from a fortune teller to someone indicates a prestigious job for the young man or a promotion at work and we wish you success in the coming days Seeing a gift of new clothes in a dream for a divorced woman indicates that he will start a new life better than the previous one. Interpretation of buying a gift for someone in a dream for a single woman If a girl sees that she is buying a gift in her dream, this indicates that the engagement or marriage date is approaching. Also, if she sees that someone she loves has bought her an expensive gift, this is a sign that the wedding date is approaching. Dream of buying a gift for someone If a girl sees that she is buying a gift in the form of clothes, this is a sign of the happiness and joy that awaits her. Interpretation of a dream of a gift for someone A dream of buying a gift for someone A gift in a dream shows great love and tenderness that connects the fortune teller with the person who gave him the gift, love and affection. Receiving gifts in a dream indicates that the dreamer enjoys great popularity and the love of those around him from his relatives and friends. The fortune teller sending gifts to someone indicates a prestigious job for the young man or a promotion at work and we wish you success in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream of buying clothes as a gift for someone Seeing gifts of clothes in a dream indicates new changes in life The dreamer. Seeing a gift from someone, which is a man's clothing or a man's shirt, indicates protection and freedom from anxiety and worry. It also indicates the good condition of the fortune teller. Seeing a young man giving a girl roses, a ring, or a watch indicates her engagement. A man's gift of clothes to his wife indicates her birth. Interpretation of a dream about a gift in a man's dream. A dream about buying a gift for someone A gift in a man's dream means positive changes in his life for the better. The gift also indicates his promotion at work. Seeing a married man buying fashionable clothes in a dream. This indicates that God will provide money, health and children. Interpretation of a dream about buying new clothes for a divorced man Seeing a gift of new clothes in a dream for a divorced woman means that she will start a new life that is better than the previous one. If you dream that a divorced woman buys a gift for someone, this means that she will marry someone else. New clothes and if she sees that her ex-husband gave her a gift, this indicates that she will return to him soon. A dream about buying a gift for someone The gift indicates the death of worries and problems and happiness and joy in the coming days. A gift of a book in a dream for singles Seeing a gift book for a girl indicates success and excellence in her educational career. A dream about buying a gift for someone The vision also indicates that you will hear good news. Buying a gift in a dream for a married woman A dream about buying a gift for someone who sees a married woman given it to her by her husband has many indications and may indicate that pregnancy is imminent. It may indicate pleasant surprises for a married woman in the coming days. Buying a gift that is a dress or accessory is evidence of the husband's effort to please his wife in every way. A gift in a dream from a stranger

Seeing a person catching a big fish in a dream may indicate the end of the difficulties that the dreamer was facing in those days, thanks to God. title: Interpretation of seeing lentils in a dream by Ibn Sirin and cooking and eating them for single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of lentils in a dream differs whether you see it in the form of grains, cooked, or in soup, as each situation and condition has an explanation previously explained by the great commentators, which we will review for you quickly through the lines below. Interpretation of the vision of lentils in a dream Ibn Sirin Among Ibn Sirin's interpretations of lentils: It states that it is a sign of blessing and abundance of money enjoyed by the dreamer. He also said that in the case of an unmarried woman who buys lentils, this indicates the possibility of her imminent marriage. As for the case of a patient who sees lentils in his dream, this indicates his recovery from his illness in the near future, God knows best. Also, when lentils are mixed with other grains such as wheat or yield, this is an indication of an abundance of money and lawful food. He explained that seeing lentils cooked in a dream is bad news because it shows the differences and problems surrounding the viewer. As for if he sees lentil soup in a dream, Ibn Sirin indicated that it is a sign of the comfort that the dreamer has attained after a journey of fatigue and misery. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of seeing food in a dream Lentils in a dream Lentils in a dream for a divorced woman In the case of a woman Divorcee, you can interpret the vision of lentils as one of the following: If he eats lentils in a dream while cooking them, this indicates a blessing, sustenance, and solving the problems they were suffering from. But if the lentils he eats are raw or dry, this indicates the anxiety and worry that the viewer was feeling. And whoever enjoys and loves the taste of lentils in a dream, this leads her to a future life full of joy and the achievement of what she aspired to. Cooking lentil soup in a dream for a single woman In the event that an unmarried girl eats lentil soup, there are several interpretations: This is a good indication of the dreams and goals that single women were seeking in their work or study. Likewise, the more the lentils are cooked, the better it is to remove obstacles and worries. In some other interpretations, it can be an indication of the possibility of her marriage soon to a husband with whom she will live a happy married life. Lentil soup in a dream In another place, whoever sees lentil soup can explain it based on any of the following: For some, eating lentil soup as long as it is well cooked is a sign of high status. But whoever eats lentil soup and finds that it has not If it ripens after, this indicates that he is facing difficulties in his life. Similarly, whoever sees that he is eating lentil soup mixed with other grains, this is a sign of good news that awaits the fortune teller. Interpretation of lentils in a dream for pregnant women Because the pregnant woman cares a lot about what she dreams of, especially since all interpretations are related to the fetus. Therefore, if you see lentils in a dream for a pregnant woman, this can be interpreted as follows: If the pregnant woman sees the lentil plant itself, this is an indication of the enormous wealth that she will enjoy after giving birth. However, if she sees herself eating the same lentils while they are still raw, this indicates the difficulties she suffers during childbirth. Eating lentils, as long as they are well cooked, is a good omen for the health of the newborn and the nutrition it brings to the woman's life

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing shampoo in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing shampoo in a dream. Interpretation of seeing buying shampoo in a dream indicates acquiring people, dealing with them, and the social situation in which one lives. The smell of buying shampoo in a dream indicates the collapse of the dreamer’s worries and obstacles, and the death of the bad situations that he was going through. It also indicates that one sees shampoo in In a dream, he relies on himself and seeks to help the person find a way out of his livelihood. Interpretation of seeing shampoo in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is washing her hair with shampoo, this indicates the end of her worries and the abundance of her happiness. Also, seeing shampoo for an unmarried girl indicates that she is looking forward to To God Almighty and make her affairs easier for her naturally, and God knows best. And the vision of buying shampoo in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of success and distinction in her academic and professional life, and God knows best. Also, washing her hair with shampoo indicates her self-reliance, the trust of her close friends, and the intelligence that she possesses. Interpretation of the vision Shampoo in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she is washing her hair with shampoo, this means that her life will naturally become easier. Likewise, if she sees her husband buying her shampoo, this indicates her husband’s love for her and the imminent pregnancy, and God knows best. The dream of removing shampoo in a married woman’s dream indicates that Her husband will travel outside the country and will not return to it. Interpretation of seeing shampoo in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is washing her hair with shampoo, this indicates that she will easily give birth to a baby girl, God willing. Also, a pregnant woman’s dream that she went to a beauty salon for her hair means that her husband will be promoted. In its function. Interpretation of seeing shampoo in a dream for men: If a man sees in a dream that he is washing his wife’s hair with shampoo in a dream, this indicates his closeness to God Almighty and his repentance from sin and misdeeds. Likewise, if an unmarried person sees in his dream that he is washing his hair, this indicates his marriage to a girl he loves. A lot, and God knows best. Also, to see shampoo in a dream about someone throwing garbage, this indicates many fears, problems, and disputes that will arise. Interpretation of seeing shampoo in a dream If one sees in his dream that he is selling shampoo, this means that he is going through a financial situation and wants to help and will help his friends Likewise, if a pregnant or married woman dreams that she is selling shampoo, this indicates that the fetus is suffering from a serious illness. Seeing a shampoo bottle in a dream is considered one of the dreams that has meaning for the sorrows and difficulties that the dreamer is going through. Also, dreaming of a large quantity of shampoo cans. It is a sign that the dreamer will get rid of his worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream about shampoo and soap. If you see yourself buying shampoo and soap in a dream, this indicates the bad situation that the owner of this dream is suffering from, but it will end well. Also, seeing many boxes of soap or shampoo in a dream indicates However, the dreamer will collect a lot of money in his life. Seeing shampoo with soap on the face in a dream indicates the difficulty of dealing with some people.
